reponse1.reponse: They used a ransomware that blocked my data, they demand 3 000 000 dollars.

reponse2.reponse: They broke into our systems and deleted all our data.

question1.question: Do you want us to try to recover your data knowing that we are not sure we will be able to recover it?
Are your servers with an external host?

question2.question: Do you have older backups of your servers?

reponse1.reponse: Yes, I would like you to try
Yes I didn't know what to do

reponse2.reponse: No, I preferred to call on your services

reponse1.reponse: Yes, we have several backups intact

question1.question: ok, we'll take care of it

question2.question: There is nothing more I can do for you. Do you want me to come and do some prevention to prevent this from happening again ?

question1.question: Why are you calling me then? What should I do?

question2.question: There is nothing more I can do for you. Do you want me to come and do some prevention to prevent this from happening again ?

question1.question: I can try to kill the malware so you won't have any more problems, if you want?
You can ask your server host to retrieve older data. Would you like me to do this for you?

question2.question: Was it only your company that was attacked or your hosting company?

question1.question: When do you want me to come and load the data?

question2.question: Okay, can I come tomorrow to load the older data for you?

question1.question: There is nothing more I can do for you. Do you want me to come and do some prevention to prevent this from happening again ?

question2.question: It will be difficult to recover your data. Do you want us to try to recover as much of your data as possible and remove the malware ?

reponse1.reponse: I would like you to come to my company to do prevention if you want to.

reponse2.reponse: Nothing, I don't know why I called you, I was probably lonely.

reponse1.reponse: No thanks, we'll take care of ourselves. We'll just be more careful next time.

reponse2.reponse: Yes, this could be a good idea. I will send you a date as soon as possible.

reponse1.reponse: I would like you to come and do some prevention so that my employees stop doing stupid things with computers.

reponse2.reponse: I would like you to suggest a solution to prevent this from happening again.

reponse1.reponse: No, I would like you to come and do prevention in my company so that this does not happen again.
Yes, that would be nice of you

reponse2.reponse: No I can do it myself I'll call them right away. Thank you very much for your help, goodbye.
I think it was my host that was attacked.

reponse1.reponse: You can come tomorrow if you can

reponse2.reponse: I will call you back tomorrow, I think. Thank you very much.

reponse2.reponse: Yes, this could be a good idea. I will send you a date as soon as possible.

reponse1.reponse: No thanks, we'll take care of ourselves.

question1.question: Perfect, I can recover an old backup of your data, directly to your remote server. You won't get all your data back but most of it.
That means I can't do much. Your data is not in your company. We can only hope that your remote server has an older backup so that we can return the data to you uncorrupted.
